Appendix table 4. Percent of local jail inmate deaths, by cause and year, 2000–2007

Note: Mortality rates are based on the average daily population (ADP). In 2000 and 2001, ADP was estimated by taking the average of January 1 and December 31 one-day inmate population counts. See appendix table 2 for the number of deaths by cause.

d/Includes other specified (such as diabetes and hepatitis) and unspecified or unknown illnesses. See appendix tables 2 and 3 of this report for a list of the more than 50 illnesses reported to the program. See Methodology for details on illness classifications.
